_tenderSinkDescription:_
The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide ISO 9001 registration services for the Meteorological Service of Canada’s (MSC) Enterprise Quality Management System (QMS). The successful contractor will be responsible for assessing the MSC’s QMS conformity to the ISO/IEC 17021 standard and identifying necessary site visits (remote or in-person) to complete the evaluation.

_contractorServices will include:._

*   Assessment of the MSC’s QMS conformity to the ISO/IEC 17021 standard
*   Identification of necessary site visits (remote or in-person) to complete the evaluation
*   Preparation of a comprehensive report detailing the assessment results and recommendations for improvement

_contractorRequirements:_

*   Must hold ISO/IEC 17021 accreditation
*   Must have experience providing ISO 9001 registration services to government or large organizations
*   Must demonstrate strong understanding of ISO/IEC 17021 and IAF MD4

_detailed project information and timelines are available._
